attributes.name: DWD ICON-EU Forecast
attributes.description: High-resolution weather forecasts for Europe from the ICON-EU model operated by Deutscher Wetterdienst (DWD).
attributes.attribution: DWD ICON-EU data processed by dynamical.org.
attributes.forecast_domain: Forecast lead time 0-120 hours (0-5 days) ahead
attributes.forecast_resolution: Forecast step 0-78 hours: hourly, 81-120 hours: 3 hourly

attributes.long_name: Downward diffusive short wave radiation flux at surface
attributes.standard_name: Mean surface diffuse short-wave radiation flux

attributes.long_name: Downward direct short wave radiation flux at surface
attributes.comment: Downward solar direct radiation flux at the surface, averaged over forecast time. This quantity is not directly provided by the radiation scheme. It is aposteriori diagnosed from the definition of the surface net shortwave radiation flux.
Cloud Cover (0 - 400 hPa). Different agencies use different short_names for this same parameter: ECMWF: HCC; WMO GRIB table: HCDC.
Cloud Cover (800 hPa - Soil). Different agencies use different short_names for this same parameter: ECMWF: LCC; WMO GRIB table: LCDC.

Maximum wind gust at 10 m above ground. It is diagnosed from the turbulence state in the atmospheric boundary layer, including a potential enhancement by the SSO parameterization over mountainous terrain. In the presence of deep convection, it contains an additional contribution due to convective gusts.
Cloud Cover (400 - 800 hPa). Different agencies use different short_names for this same parameter: ECMWF: MCC; WMO GRIB table: MCDC.
Total precipitation accumulated since model start. TOT_PREC = RAIN_GSP + SNOW_GSP + RAIN_CON + SNOW_CON.

attributes.long_name: Pressure reduced to mean sea level (MSL)

attributes.comment: Relative humidity at 2m above ground. Other short_names used for this parameter: rh, 2r, r.
Snow depth in m. It is diagnosed from RHO_SNOW and W_SNOW according to H_SNOW = W_SNOW / RHO_SNOW and is limited to H_SNOW <= 40 m.
Snow depth water equivalent in kg/m2. Set to 0 above water surfaces and snow-free land points.
Soil water runoff (accumulated since model start)
A perfect sphere geographic CRS with a radius of 6,371,229m, extracted from grib.
attributes.geographic_crs_name: Coordinate System imported from GRIB file

attributes.comment: Surface water runoff from interception and snow reservoir and from limited infiltration rate. Sum over forecast.
Temperature at 2m above ground, averaged over all tiles of a grid point. Different agencies use different short_names for this parameter: ECMWF: 2t; NOAA & DWD: t2m.
Total cloud cover. Different agencies use different short_names for this same parameter: ECMWF: TCC; NOAA & WMO: TCDC.
